original_text: Then he shouted with a loud voice, like a lion that roars. When he shouted, seven loud voices answered him. They were like the noise of thunder.
korean_text: 사자가 부르짖는 것 같이 큰 소리로 외치니 그가 외칠 때에 일곱 우레가 그 소리를 내어 말하더라

sentences.original_text: Then he shouted with a loud voice

sentences.korean_translation: 일곱 개의 큰 목소리가 그에게 대답했다

sentences.original_text: They were like the noise of thunder
